alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Park County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 22 at 8:59AM MST until December 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills ongoing. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...South Park. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. Wind chill values may fall to extremely dangerous levels. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
